comments:
I200410190941, GTK+ 2.4.9, Linux 2.6.8.1, KDE 3.3.0 
 
I shutdown the workbench with two plugin.xml files open.  On restart, when 
switching to the (initially) inactive editor, this exception occurs.  I'm not 
sure if it is reproducible.
